casebody.data:
Nathaniel LAWSON, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
NATIONAL CONTINENTAL, Defendant. C-597 September Term 2017
080054 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 09, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002296-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
